title: Forerunner: Back To Earth
features: Zeke Taylor has come far from his small-town Kansas home to the planet Anyar. Finding and helping a stranger led him light-years from home into the middle of a generations long conflict with the Rogue, a race of intelligent machines who've attacked Anyar randomly for the past one hundred years.The stranger was the son of Anyar's king. Now, he's been invited to enter the Anyari military academy and, with luck, train to fly a fighter.Why? How do they think he can keep up with the other cadets who've grown up with Anyar's technology: interstellar flight and machine intelligences.What chance does he have? But, then, what does he have to lose?The first book in the forerunner series. In development, Forerunner:Out Into Darkness
description: is a novel about a normal young man in extraordinary circumstances.This is my first novel and it has undergone extensive, professional proofreading since initially published on Amazon.

Anyar has endured random attacks by the Rogue, a race of intelligent machines, for hundreds of years. With the arrival of the long lost carrier, Redun, in time to turn back the latest attack, the planet is now ready to stop hiding and seek out the enemy.Hitching a ride from Earth on the Redun, Zeke Taylor played a small, but visible, role in that battle. Now he has the attention of the military, the planet, and--evidently--the King's daughter.
